0000101001110101 0010110010011010 1 -> sum: 0011011100010000, cout: 0
1010001110010000 1100010100010001 1 -> sum: 0110100010100010, cout: 1

1110101101010011 0100101000010001 0 -> sum: 0011010101100100, cout: 1
1000001000001100 0001011000010100 0 -> sum: 1001100000100000, cout: 0
0110101101010001 1011001110111010 1 -> sum: 0001111100001100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
